entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 27 April 2016
